title: Roman Uzdenov
text:
Roman Uzdenov (born 10 March 1979) is a <a href="Kazakhs">Kazakh</a> <a href="soccer">football</a> coach and a former <a href="Striker%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a>. He is currently an assistant coach with <a href="FC%20Shakhter%20Karagandy">FC Shakhter Karagandy</a>.
He also has caps in the <a href="Kazakhstan%20national%20football%20team">Kazakhstan national football team</a>.
